These examples from official rapidjson packages:
https://code.google.com/p/rapidjson/downloads/list

[Test input for pretty]
{ "hello" : "world"}
{ "hello" : "world", "t" : true , "f" : false, "n": null, "i":123, "pi": 3.1416, "a":[1, 2, 3, 4] } 

[Test input for condense]
{
    "hello": "world",
    "t": true,
    "f": false,
    "n": null,
    "i": 123,
    "pi": 3.1416,
    "a": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4
    ]
}
